title: BP wins offshore oil block in Brazil with $75 mln bid
text:
BP wins offshore oil block in Brazil with $75 mln bid

Commodities 1 hour ago (Oct 11, 2019 01:00)

© Reuters. BP wins offshore oil block in Brazil with $75 mln bid RIO DE JANEIRO, Oct 10 (Reuters) - BP PLC won the production and exploration rights for Brazil's offshore S-M-1500 block in the Santos Basin on Thursday, paying the government a signing bonus of roughly 308 million reais ($74.6 million). Relatively major blocks in the Santos Basin received no offers in the bidding round in Rio de Janeiro, although there was significant interest in the nearby Campos Basin. = 4.13 reais)
